SEARCH
Modul model
Package de.kaiser.model.style

Klasse PageMasterStyle

java.lang.Object
de.kaiser.model.style.PageMasterStyle
public class PageMasterStyle extends Object
Represents the styling properties for a page layout in the document. This maps to the fo:simple-page-master element in XSL-FO.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • PageMasterStyle

      public PageMasterStyle()
      Default constructor. Primarily used for deserialization (e.g., by Jackson).

    • PageMasterStyle

      public PageMasterStyle(String name, String pageHeight, String pageWidth, String marginTop, String marginBottom, String marginLeft, String marginRight, String headerExtent, String footerExtent, String columnCount, String columnGap)
      Full constructor setting all possible page layout properties.
      Parameter:
      name - A unique identifier for this style.
      pageHeight - The total page height, including unit (e.g., "29.7cm").
      pageWidth - The total page width, including unit (e.g., "21cm").
      marginTop - Top margin, including unit.
      marginBottom - Bottom margin, including unit.
      marginLeft - Left margin, including unit.
      marginRight - Right margin, including unit.
      headerExtent - Space reserved for the header, including unit.
      footerExtent - Space reserved for the footer, including unit.
      columnCount - Number of columns (e.g., "1").
      columnGap - Space between columns, including unit (e.g., "0.5cm").

    • PageMasterStyle

      public PageMasterStyle(String name, PageMasterStyle.PageSize pageSize, String marginTop, String marginBottom, String marginLeft, String marginRight, String headerExtent, String footerExtent, String columnCount, String columnGap)
      Constructor using a predefined PageSize (e.g., A4_PORTRAIT) and specific layout properties.
      Parameter:
      name - A unique identifier for this style.
      pageSize - The predefined page size (e.g., PageSize.A4_PORTRAIT).
      marginTop - Top margin, including unit.
      marginBottom - Bottom margin, including unit.
      marginLeft - Left margin, including unit.
      marginRight - Right margin, including unit.
      headerExtent - Space reserved for the header, including unit.
      footerExtent - Space reserved for the footer, including unit.
      columnCount - Number of columns (e.g., "1").
      columnGap - Space between columns, including unit (e.g., "0.5cm").

    • PageMasterStyle

      public PageMasterStyle(String name)
      Creates a default A4 Portrait page layout with standard margins.

      Defaults:

      • Page Size: A4 Portrait (21cm x 29.7cm)
      • Margins: 2cm (top/bottom), 2.5cm (left/right)
      • Header/Footer: 1.5cm
      • Columns: 1
      Parameter:
      name - A unique identifier for this page master style.
